page.title: 13 Education in Keith
page.content: In Keith there are two primary schools -Keith Primary and St.Thomas's,where Roman Catholic pupils attend.After seven years,all pupils transfer to the secondary school,Keith Grammar.There is also the Ogilvie Special School,where handicapped pupils are taught. Altogether,around 998 pupils attend the Keith schools.They attend for five days per week,200 days a year. Pupils have 6 weeks holiday in summer,2 weeks at Xmas and 2 weeks at Easter.Also,schools close for 1 week in October,when many children help with the potato harvest. All pupils are advised to wear uniform which for girls is a blue or white blouse,grey or navy skirt at knee length,grey or navy cardigan or pullover and black or brown low heeled shoes.A gold and navy striped tie completes the uniform.
